name: Rolf (itch)
description:
Rolf!

It's rolling golf!

Complete the holes in as little strokes as possible. Aim and pull back your die by clicking and dragging, and send it towards the green!

Known Issues:

  • "I'm too bouncy!" - The reset method at the end of the level does NOT trigger, meaning that your effects might stack without you knowing (for example, you might be extra bouncy if you finished on a 3 on the previous level). It SHOULD only affect your first shot, but the physics based ones (friction and bounce) do not reset properly in the physics system. FIX: Refresh the browser before each run - your score is saved!
  • "Level 4 is hard!" - yes it is, I was a very sinister game developer for this level in my sleep-deprived state at 4AM,
  • "Don't golf courses have more than 4 holes?" - Perhaps, but you are forgetting this is a ROLF course,

Controls:

  • Click, Drag and Release to launch the die,
  • Use the scroll wheel to zoom in/out
  • Press "R" to restart a level,
  • Press "Q" to quit to main menu,
  • Press "M" to mute all sound.

Good luck!

Made for the GMTK Gam Jam 2022 by one person in 48 hours! Theme: Roll Of The Dice
